result.execSummary:
The defendant Sterling L Soman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fail/Report to County Jail (10 Days +) [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1m)(b).
  • Ordinance Violation - Bail Jumping. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Forest County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Defendant must submit a DNA sample.
Huber and good time allowed - eligible for community service under 973.03(3).

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sterling L Soman

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: entered civil judgement as jail already cancelled the warrant as defendant is incarcerated in prison

Court addressed the warrant on this case - defendant indicates he has the money to pay the balance due. Court instructs to pay the amount due otherwise will not be eligible for programs while incarcerated. Warrant remains until fine paid in full.

Defendant Sterling L Soman in court with attorney Jeffery Joy.  Defendant Sterling L Soman in custody.  Charles James Simono appeared for the Forest, County of. Called at 9:46 AM. Also called 15CF42. State - here for sentencing on 14CF131 and INIT on 15CF42. Joy and Soman have complaint on 15CF42, waives reading, requests PH but waives time limits. Court sets 15CF42 for PH. Court sets cash bond at $1000.00 - no consumption of alcohol, no possession of any firearms. Joy objects to bond forfeiture of $750.00. Court finds good cause to not forfeit the $750.00 and orders cash bond at $1750.00 with same conditions as previously stated. State - sentencing for count #1 - 180 days in Forest County jail with a $500.00 fine plus costs. Joy makes final argument - agrees with joint recommendation. Soman withholds comment. Court sentences the defendant to the following: 180 days in FC jail - huber and good time allowed - community service under 973.03(3), $500 fine plus costs totalling $1158.00 with DNA surcharge - 60 days to pay/CO, submit DNA sample, no possession of firearms, no voting right, right to appeal, adjourned.

Defendant Sterling L Soman not in court, Attorney Jeffery Joy in court.  Charles James Simono appeared for State. State - Defendant has been arrested in Oconto County. Did not have enough time to writ him here as jail requires 24 hour notice to pick up. Joy asks for another date. Court adjourns - State to do writ.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 10, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Sterling L Soman in court with attorney Jeffery Joy appears telephonically.  Charles James Simono appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called at 10:51 AM. Court does collaquey with defendant in regards to Joy appearing telephonically to do a plea and Soman has plea questionnaire with him. Joy - plead G to count #1 as alleged, 6 month jail sentence and costs. State - supposed to plead to count #2 as amended to county ordinance of BJ. State - count #1 - plead as alleged with joint recommendation of 180 days in FC jail, $500 fine plus costs, amend #2 to county ordinane of BJ, $1000 fine plus costs, #3 - DRI. Joy and Soman agree. Court dismisses and reads in count #3. Court amends count #2 to county ordinance of NJ, pleads G, finds G, fine of $1000 plus costs totalling $1464.50 - take bond posted, remainder due in 30 days/CO. Soman pleads G to count #1 as alleged. Court has plea questionnaire, goes thru it, finds the defendant has freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his constitutional rights and right to JT, accepts plea, adjudges guilty, proceed to sentencing. Joy asks for another date for sentencing. 4/1/ 3:45 p.m. Called 15CF42 - Warrant for failure to appear on March 12th, issued body or $1000. Joy makes statement regarding defendant not able to post bond. Remanded on 15CF42.

Defendant Sterling L Soman in court with attorney Jeffery Arthur Joy.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called at 4:54 PM. Joy - no resolution - set for trial - understands plea agreement and Frye. Court continues bond.  Jury trial scheduled for March 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Sterling L Soman
Current: P.O. Box 85, Crandon, WI 54520 United States  (Effective: 01-14-2015)
Prior: PO Box 219, Wabeno, WI 54566
Final pre-trial on January 21, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Called at 3:17 PM. Sterling Soman appears in person and his counsel Jeff Joy appears telephonically. State appears by Charles Simono. Court instructs defendant how difficult it is to prepare for court when the defendant does not keep in contact with his attorney and is considering imposing a larger cash bond. Joy responds. Court continues bond, set for another FPT on 1/21/15 at 3:30 PM, defendant told to keep in contact with his attorney. Court - if not resolved next week, plan on taking the matter to JT on either 2/5 or 2/6/15.
Final pre-trial on January 14, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Called at 2:21 PM. Sterling Soman appears in person and in custody with attorney Jeff Joy. State appears by Jodie Bednar-Clemens. Joy files waiver of PH. Court has waiver, goes thru it, finds the defendant has freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his right to PH, finds probable cause, binds over for trial. State files Information that mirrors complaint. Joy has Information, waives reading of it, will proceed to ARGN today and enters NG pleas to all counts. Court accepts plea, continues bond, set for FPT on 1/14/15 at 3:00 PM.
from defendant requesting bond reduction - clerk informed defendant's attorney
and Certificate of Appearance - Police Officer DP
Preliminary hearing on December 11, 2014 at 02:15 pm.

Called at 10:27 AM. Sterling Soman appears via video from FOSO and without counsel. State appears by Jodie Bednar Clemens. Soman does not have complaint. Court instructs State to send complaint to FOSO for the defendant. Court reads charges and penalties and right to attorney and court appointed attorney. Soman understands charges and penalties, has contacted Jeff Joy. Court instructs that Mr. Joy will be here later this afternoon, will recall this matter when he gets here. Re-called at 2:41 PM. Sterling Soman appears via video from FOSO and his attorney Jeff Joy appears in person. State appears by Jodie Bednar-Clemens. Soman was previously read the charges and penalties. Joy waives further reading, requests PH but waives time limts, set for PH at 12/11/14 at 2:15 PM.
